member.name: P:atcControls.atcGrid.Fixed3D
member.summary: True for fixed rows and columns to be rendered with 3-D look

member.name: M:atcControls.atcGrid.SetHScroller
member.summary: Set HScroller.Minimum and HScroller.Maximum from current column widths
member.returns: True if HScroller.Value had to be changed to fit between new Minimum and Maximum

member.name: T:atcControls.ATCoSelectListSortByProp
member.summary: This control is a dual-paned selection tool with a list box in each pane. The items in each list box are sorted by ascending alphanumeric order of a specified property.

member.name: M:atcControls.ATCoSelectListSortByProp.LeftItemFastAdd(System.Object)
member.summary: Alternative to setting LeftItem(index)=NewValue. Adds to end of list without checking for duplicates.
member.param: New value to add to left list

member.name: M:atcControls.ATCoSelectListSortByProp.MoveRight(System.Int32)
member.summary: Move an item from the left list to the right list
member.param: zero-based index of item in left list
member.remarks: Inserts into right list in sorted order if SortMember was set, adds to end of right list if no SortMember
